description: Liquid DRAX (LDRAX) is an innovative token within the DRAX ecosystem, engineered to provide superior liquidity and exceptional yield opportunities. When you stake DRAX, you receive LDRAX in return. Even if you lock your DRAX for 10 days, you remain liquid by being able to sell LDRAX at any time. As a versatile digital asset, Liquid DRAX empowers users to engage in liquid staking, offering flexibility and accessibility. Designed to cater to both beginners and seasoned investors, Liquid DRAX provides a dependable and profitable way to enhance digital asset portfolios.
